text:
Emilio Disi (2 August 1943 – 14 March 2018) was an Argentine actor and comedian. He was born in Buenos Aires. Acting from 1968 until his death in 2018, he appeared in Daniel Burman's 2002 movie "Todas las azafatas van al cielo". Disi also appeared in a number of TV series. His last performance in movies was in 2004 in "Los de la esquina".
Disi died in Buenos Aires of lung cancer on 14 March 2018 at the age of 75.

annotations.surface_form: Todas las azafatas van al cielo
